name: places/ChIJs4S8HvjzwokRDvmOWzFQSLk
formattedAddress: 651 Academy St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 651 Academy St, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Insoo, Om is a great dermatologist. I love how he included my daughter in her treatment plan, went step by step what was going to happen and explained her treatment plan for a 10 year old. The only down side is the amount of time you have to wait to be seen, but I guess when you want great care that’s what comes with it.

text.text: Insoo, Om is a great dermatologist. I love how he included my daughter in her treatment plan, went step by step what was going to happen and explained her treatment plan for a 10 year old. The only down side is the amount of time you have to wait to be seen, but I guess when you want great care that’s what comes with it.

originalText.text: 1st off the Dermatologist that treated me seamed bothered for what ever work related reasons. Upon getting my monthly shots to treat my Keloids in the back of my head, He didn't clean the area with alcohol swabs where he was going to inject of which is standard for every doctor to perform, instead he went straight to injecting as if he was in a rush. It felt like a hi and by type of situation. Normally where I used to get my shots at St Lukes Hospital, the doctors would ask me questions and/ or give advise about my condition and give updates. Also he never asks if I needed Meds or recommended any type of medication to treat my Keloids. I didn't want to flip out and make a scene because I was in need of my shots but I wouldn't recommend him to anyone with the same issues that I have. Everything felt rushed but the Staff members were great and informative.

originalText.text: Although there may be a long wait, as he does see lots of patients in one day - I’ve been seeing Dr. Om as his patient for 3 years now and I have no complaints. He has addressed my concerns, works with me to get my refills, and updates me on new available treatments. He makes sure that any financial concerns is taken in consideration and makes choices based on the person and their environment. I like the attention of his assistants and how helpful they all are. Never had an issue.

Never had an issue.

originalText.text:
I would have  give them 5 stars because i was happy with my appointment and the Doctor was excellent. He took care of my issue very well , also for my partner had a bigger issue he explained it with drawings , when doctors starts drawing you your condition thats it i like that because he wants to make sure that you have an understanding of what he is saying to you! Will recommend him for sure.
Staff was professional,friendly and communicative.
My only negative review about this doctor office the wait time, you are giving an appointment time, but when you arrive is  first time first serve -y'all know what that means ! I waited almost 2 hours to be seen . Insane .
When making the appointment call center should mention  that part so that you go and be aware of the wait is just only fair for the patient to have the option because sometimes people have a lot going on their day.

originalText.text:
My experience here has truly been great. I started going last year during the summer due to discoloration that I wanted to get rid of and acne, the knowledge and treatments the doctor offered was great. I then went on a vacation and came back with terrible sunburn, REALLY terrible. He again treated it and I saw results within a week :)

Due to work and stress I have now been going on. Weekly basis due yo areal alopecia, I have been seeing amazing results and can confidently refer him and his great team to anyone.

I will say, the wait times are long since he’s not in the office all 5 days of the week but if you are desperate to see results the wait time is well worth it in my opinion
